articles.title: How soon is too soon? 'Six Days in Fallujah' out 18 years after battle - Marine Corps Times
articles.description: A controversial first-person shooter based on an actual battle and featuring real-life Marines in the game is now available to play on PC.
articles.content:
In November 2004, U.S. and allied forces descended upon the insurgent-controlled city of Fallujah in Iraqs Al Anbar province.
For roughly six weeks they fought house to house and room by room agains… [+18273 chars]
